text: "Stars Are Blind" is a song recorded by American socialite Paris Hilton for her debut studio album, Paris (2006). It was released as the lead single from the album on June 5, 2006, by Warner Bros. Records. The song was written by Fernando Garibay, Sheppard Solomon and Ralph McCarthy. It was produced by Garibay with extra production by Solomon. Jennifer Karr was the vocal arranger and background vocalist for the song. ==Track listing== * Digital download # "Stars Are Blind" — 3:56 * Digital download (U.S. Maxi Single) # "Stars Are Blind" (Luny Tunes Remix featuring Wisin and Yandel) — 4:16 #
